meanings.definition: An imaging technique that uses X-rays to obtain real-time moving images of the internal structures of a patient's body.
meanings.sent1: During the fluoroscopy, the doctor watched the X-ray images in real-time.
meanings.sent2: The hospital used fluoroscopy to see inside the patient's body during the surgery.
meanings.sent3: The fluoroscopy machine seemed like a magical window into the patient's body.
meanings.sent4: Her eyes were like fluoroscopy, seeing through the layers of deception.
meanings.sent5: The fluoroscopy revealed the hidden fracture with clarity and precision.

meanings.definition: The process of performing a fluoroscopic examination on a patient.
meanings.sent1: The fluoroscopy was scheduled for tomorrow to check the patient's lungs.
meanings.sent2: Doctors used fluoroscopy to guide the catheter during the procedure.
meanings.sent3: The patient joked that the fluoroscopy made them feel like a movie star on a set.
meanings.sent4: Her scrutiny was like a fluoroscopy, revealing every detail of the situation.
meanings.sent5: The fluoroscopy process was quick and painless, providing valuable insights.
